definition: to place in the care of sb (a child, pet etc)/to foster/to board out
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Cross-fostering must be complete max. 36 hours after farrowing.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在仔猪出生36小时之内完成仔猪的寄养。

sentences.english: The family has positive roles to the adaptation behavior development of the orphan deformity children to foster.
sentences.chinese: 家庭寄养对孤残儿童的适应行为发展有着积极作用。

sentences.english: You are expected to attend all training sessions at the Hope Foster Home when these are scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 寄养家庭必须保证可以参加希望之家举办的培训会。

sentences.english: Establishing a family fosterage network within its own administrative region and supervising its operation;
sentences.chinese: 建立本地区家庭寄养工作网络并指导其运行。

sentences.english: Providing technical services to the fostering families in their fosterage work;
sentences.chinese: 为寄养家庭养育被寄养儿童提供技术性服务。

sentences.english: Providing technical services to the fostering families in their fosterage work;
sentences.chinese: 为寄养家庭养育被寄养儿童提供技术性服务。

sentences.english: Reporting regularly to the family fosterage service organizations of the growth of the fostered children;
sentences.chinese: 定期向家庭寄养服务机构反映被寄养儿童的成长情况。

sentences.english: Reporting regularly to the family fosterage service organizations of the growth of the fostered children;
sentences.chinese: 定期向家庭寄养服务机构反映被寄养儿童的成长情况。

sentences.english: The blastocyst is then surgically introduced into the uterus of a foster mother.
sentences.chinese: 然后通过手术把胚囊引进寄养母体的子宫内。

sentences.english: Formulating the family fosterage plan of its own administrative region and organizing to implement it;
sentences.chinese: 制定本行政区域内家庭寄养工作计划并组织实施。

sentences.english: Each child to foster cognitive is different.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩对寄养家庭的认知都有所不同。

sentences.english: Reporting the family fosterage goings to the civil affairs administration on the higher levels and bringing forth the corresponding suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 向上级民政部门反映家庭寄养工作情况并提出建议。

sentences.english: He's been through numerous foster families and group homes.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经被无数寄养家庭和家庭式宿舍领养过。

sentences.english: Original, they are orphan, fosterage be partinged.
sentences.chinese: 原来，她们是孤儿，被分别寄养。

definition: to take in and care for (an elderly person, a dog etc)/to adopt (a child)/adoption
to offer shelter/to have sb in one's care
to look after/to attend to/to have in care
to feed (a child, domestic animal etc)/to keep/to raise (an animal)
